PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-07152018-06-11,  ISED,  ,  , 
ActIndustrial Design Act
SubjectIndustrial Design Regulations
PrecisINDUSTRIAL DESIGN REGULATIONS in order to (1) carry out the amendments that were made to the Act in order to allow Canada’s accession to the Hague System. This would align Canada’s framework with international norms and reduce the regulatory burden on business, lower costs and remove red tape; and (2) modernize Canada’s industrial design (ID) regime by updating, clarifying, codifying and improving aspects of the ID regulatory framework.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0120 Publication Date: 2018-06-27
